verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:14
verses.text: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:15
verses.text: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:16
verses.text: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.
